website_summaries.verdict: Great price point for produce spray that's available in an easy-to-use spray bottle.
pros: Will remove pesticides, waxes, and other contaminants from fruits and vegetables easily
Provides a relatively low price per ounce for the wash
Doesn't leave any odd smells or tastes on produce
cons: Quality control problems with the spray trigger, as it may leak when you're using it

customer_reviews.title: Great fruit and veggie cleaner with no aftertaste or odor.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great, have ordered it several times. In the past I just rinsed fruit or vegetables, but I was at the grocery store recently and saw a very cute kid touching all the fruit. He also had a runny nose, and I just thought, 'better remember to really wash the fruit when I get home.' The great thing about Veggie Wash is you can feel the wax film wash off of certain fruit. It really does a great job of cleaning and doesn't leave any odd smell or taste. As I said, I've bought this before and make sure my kitchen always has a spray bottle nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Me in SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Gets the white coating right off of grapes!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff! We use it for washing all sorts of fruits and veggies. I do try to rinse it off well, however, since it is made with citrus products, it is probably fine if you don't get every last drop off. My husband and my favorite use: Grapes. It gets the white coating that they come with from the grocery store right off. Just spray this stuff on, gently rub the grapes in your hands, and rinse. Viola! It's gone.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with this cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The wash leaves a bitter after taste on fruits like grapes after swishing them and rinsing thoroughly with water.Also when mixed with water it had a foam like soap on the surface.. When spraying on potatos,etc.I would recommend using gloves to prevent the skin of your hands from being exposed to the toxic pesticides and absorbed through your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this for 4 months with good results
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this veggie wash for 4 months. I had used been using another product, but this one was similar and more economical. I use it on all my larger size fruits and vegetables (i.e. apples, oranges, lemons, mangos, melons, avocados, tomatoes, potatoes). Sometimes, I can't believe the dirt that comes off with the spray before I even rinse them off with water. Unless I get something from my own garden, I never cut or eat produce without cleaning it first. I especially like this spray because it not only removes the dirt but also takes the wax off apples and other produce.
customer_reviews.author: D37

customer_reviews.title: Great on all types of food
customer_reviews.text: This is the best food prep wash I have tried yet !!!! My husband and I have been looking for a good food prep wash for literally years. I used to own a restaurant and had a food prep wash that got rid of most of the chemicals and excess things on veggies and meats that we shouldn’t be eating, but we hadn’t been able to find one until now!!! But this is the closest to it!!!! This really works and it doesn’t leave a residue!!! I’m a Happy Camper!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I used to wash my fruit and veggies with water and just eat it!! No more after seeing all the gross stuff that comes off!! Will continue to use and share with family & friends!
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Anno

customer_reviews.title: a good product to have
customer_reviews.text: some vegetables and small size fruits are very hard to wash, especially berries. This product is very good with removing fruit wax and tiny dirt. All you need to do is just spray all over those fruits in a bowl, then rinse with running water after about 30 seconds. You can notice the result right away. Also, it can easily remove those tiny " white hairs" on the outer layer of peaches in seconds. Because those tiny hairy stuff gives me allergic reaction. But, now, I can enjoy peaches again. I will commend to design a travel size to go with the package, so people can carry it with them when leaving their house.
customer_reviews.author: Ladd

customer_reviews.title: makes me doubt if it’s real
customer_reviews.text: This delivery was very weird. The upper part was white, with no red parts as I receiver before or like on the picture on Amazon. Moreover, the upper parts were different in 3 bottles received (2 similar and 1 different). Bottles were leaked, all wet. Packed also in a weird way - in 2 enormously large transparent bags. Nothing else to protect the bottles in a larger box. The substance inside smells similar to the bottles I got before. Looks not too professional. Will order from another seller next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Bakunin

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: My sister recommended this to me since my boys are absolutely obsessed with fruits and I can truthfully say it has not disappointed. This makes the fruit look so much better after a wash. I can't say if it makes it last longer since nothing lasts in my house for more than 2 days. I enjoy that it gives the fruit a clean wash and you can see the grime rinse off. The fruit tastes delicious and it was pretty easy to use. Sprayed some into a bowl with water let it sit and then slowly rotated came out looking clean. I clean and cut the fruit all at once so it didn't add to my process at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Araiza-Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one, along with another one and did a comparison (sorry, no photos). This works very well on some produce. I think it depends on what substance is on the produce. For example, I would use this product on grapes and blueberries. It worked great on the blueberries. but not so much on the grapes. It works well, but I will finish this one and stick to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: Best Veggie Wash!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years. It is the absolute best fresh veggie wash. You can use it on dried beans for the first wash, and it is amazing how much dirt comes off. It is also great for fruits! I even use it on the first rinse of fresh strawberries. Super dooper amazing stuff. Nothing harmful~
customer_reviews.author: Karen Moore

customer_reviews.title: The only way to wash your produce
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for decades. My mom washes produce with water and I just never thought that was useful. I also refuse to add chemicals to my food and wash it with soap. This stuff works. You'll notice it the first time you wash an apple. Spray, scrub/rub/roll in your hands and rinse. You'll feel the wax just came right off. ew. I spray this on greens, berries, even lemons & limes. There is no taste if you rinse properly and it lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I feel very good about washing all of my produce with this veggie wash; it has a very clean, citrusy essence to it and you can just feel the yuckies being washed off when you use this. I just give my apples a few good sprays, rinse them off, wipe them off with a paper towel and they are so much cleaner and taste great. I'm glad I can get it in a 3-pack because I use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Lucys_mommy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Before eating any fruit or vegetable I spray some of this liquid on the item, rub it around for about 20 seconds and rinse thoroughly. Even if you aren't going to eat the exterior of the fruit, an example is an orange, it leaves all produce squeaky clean. Washing romaine and other leafy greens, I put some water in the sink and pour in a little veggie wash, swish the leaves around and rinse thoroughly. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: gophergirl

customer_reviews.title: Me so happy!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I’m not sure why the review is asking me to rate the flavor on this cause it’s used to wash veges and fruit and you supposed to rinse it off before eating it but anyway it’s a good value so I’m happy with this purchase! Plus I cannot find this in the stores right now due to the covid19 it’s gone off the shelves from people like me who is all paranoid, you know what I mean 😱
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Love this veggie wash, it is safe, cleans fruits and veggies and has a very pleasant smell. I use it even on the "twice washed" salad greens, I put them in a bowl with a little water and a few squirts of the veggie for a few minutes and them rinse and dry them. With fruits and vegetables I spray it directly on them, then rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Jay&Marie

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: This does a nice job getting rid of waxy and chemical buildup on produce . People asked me where I get my blueberries because they are beautifully blue without any film. I told them it was the veggie wash that removed the buildup. I use it on all fruits and vegetables. I like to use it on fresh broccoli, peppers, etc. where so many people handle them because they are exposed in the grocery stores.
customer_reviews.author: Leeann

customer_reviews.title: Product great.... shipping.. not so much
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is awesome. The shipping however, needs work. The product leaked, soaked through the box, and led to me receiving a plastic wrapped, soaked in product, box. It did arrive quickly at least.... just... maybe some new ideas for sealing this for shipping might be.. a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Mom

customer_reviews.title: Happy I found veggie wash again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I spray it on my veggies and fruit to remove the the pesticide coating on the fruits and vegetables I leave it on for 30 seconds, rinse it very well...it leaves no taste behind if anything it cleans your vegetables or fruit very well. Blueberries have that white substance on them after they're rinsed they look beautiful. Blue line they should. I used to buy this at the grocery store. Then they stopped carrying the wash. I was disappointed. So Amazon here I come...as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Wash your stuff before eating!  With Veggie Wash!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wash for all your fruit and veggies. Zero aftertaste & easy to rinse. I’ve been using for years. Found it at WholeFoods and during shelter in place I ordered from Amazon. I ride a motorcycle and I also use the wash to clean my expensive ear plugs. Works great. Very gentle formula.
customer_reviews.author: Prime CA Fan

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I can agree with everyone regarding the taste. If you leave it soaking for too long, it’ll definitely leave a weird taste... but it’s not terrible. I can also agree with everyone regarding how well this cleans produce. So much disgusting stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Antha

customer_reviews.title: Wow.  Talk about taking advantage!
customer_reviews.text: Wow unbelievable. Over double the original price. It is very easy to make yourself. I just googled it. I thought it was illegal to price gouge!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Neske

customer_reviews.title: Must have! Great purchase! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I’ve never tried this type of product before but with all this going on now days I really took it into consideration that we need to be more cautious and extra safe especially because for my children! I’ve tried it on all fruits! Such a noticeable different especially when I tired it on my apples and blueberries! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Momhoodfeedback

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to ensure those fruits/veggies are clean
customer_reviews.text: No flavor and makes me worry less about who's touching my produce. Simply spray, set aside for a few and then rinse. No more soaking in vinegar or scrubbing like crazy. Been using for years before my store stopped carrying. Luckily, Amazon came to the rescue. Won't eat produce without.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Finished my first three bottles and I will definitely purchase again. I can really tell the difference when I don't use it. Veggies and fruit taste better. Yum! I can definitely taste and notice the difference using this. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pnut41

customer_reviews.title: Great product no soapy suds
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Cleans my fruit and vegetables easily without suds. i would’ve given 5 stars but there was leakage. I transferred into another bottle. The good thing is the bottles where in a plastic bag so it didn’t get everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: I feel like use saline or baking soda better than this product during this time!More healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to vinegar
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! One can wash fruit and veggies with vinegar 🤢, but I don't like the smell. This nice citrus concoction to clean is nice and easy to use. Goes fast, took a while to get it as it was out of stock for high demand, so it was nice that it came in a 3 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Benitez

customer_reviews.title: It Apparently Works!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Has a pleasant odor. I can't really tell its effectiveness next to common rinse of food in plain H2O. Nobody got sick before I used this product and nobody since has gotten sick, but I feel safer with its use.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Coologeorgen

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I usually just rinsed my fruit and produce.. Then someone mentioned this product and I figured I would try it.. I love grapes and this makes a big difference in the way they feel and the aftertaste.. No more feeling like there is dust in my mouth after having grapes.. Buy it..
customer_reviews.author: Jake J.

customer_reviews.title: A necessity in my house
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have known about this 10 years ago. Washes produce squeaky clean. I was shocked the first time I washed potatoes with it... the water was brown, unlike anything I’ve seen before. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I don't know why our local stores have stopped selling ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why our local stores have stopped selling fruit and vegetable washes. If you spray this and rub the fruit or veggies after you think you've rinsed off the dirt and pesticides you would see for yourself how well this product works. Thanks Amazon for selling this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fryman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, spray bottle sucks
customer_reviews.text: Great product, spray bottle sucks. 4 out of 4 bottles failed to spray. If you are going to have a great product the delivery method should be considered. Complete garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Zicchino

customer_reviews.title: Good but you may not need it
customer_reviews.text: This veggie and fruit clean spray is very easy to use, but probably you do not really need it. Since I will still use water to clean the vegetables again after I used the spray.
customer_reviews.author: shirley ren

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Customer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years. It removes dirt, wax, and anything else hard to remove with just water. I love that it doesn't make my food taste funny. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: D. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Fruit & veggie wash!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this vegetable and fruit wash for awhile and they are consistent. I use this mainly for my thinner skin fruits and it seems to do a good job!
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Same price as buying in supermarket but works well to clean veggies
customer_reviews.text: Great price and love the product but it arrived so so late I waited over 2 months for these. Also I think apple cider vinegar cleans just as good
customer_reviews.author: Delwara

customer_reviews.title: Veggie wash Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but find the sprayer gives out. I bought 3 and the last one which I just recently opened no longer sprays. I have no idea how to avoid this. Does anybody?
customer_reviews.author: alwazalady

customer_reviews.title: Take a look at my photo
customer_reviews.text: Just take a look at my grapes and see. Picture tells you all. That’s how much yuckiness it removes. I can’t live without this product
customer_reviews.author: Chieko Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning veggies/fruits with orange oil
customer_reviews.text: A natural way to wash/rinse chemical residue out of veggies and fruits with natural orange oil. Bright orange oil scent.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, rejuvanates produce and keeps it fresh longer-
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to do a better job prepping my produce for veggie smoothies. Not sure about what competing products offer, but this one seems to work very well. An unexpected bonus is that after prepping the veggies as directed, it seemed to really rejuvanate the produce and I noticed that the veggies stayed fresher longer. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: idateacher2Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Dishwashing Liquid?
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can't tell the difference but they told me to stop washing my fruits and vegetables with Dawn so🤷🏽‍♀️ 😂🤣😂🤣
customer_reviews.author: Freeyah Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Just want to point out that in the past, some sellers have not packaged this appropriately to avoid a leak. This seller had the products sealed in plastic, and it arrived perfectly. And a terrific value. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I eat a lot of fruit and use this every time. It takes away the wax and grime off fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S.

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: With how much concer there is for pesticides on produce, this really gives me peace of mind in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Ng Meowster

customer_reviews.title: Everyone who buys fresh fruit & veggies should buy and ...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who buys fresh fruit & veggies should buy and use this product. You won't believe the gray water that comes off your produce when you wash it with this product! You will never want to just wash your produce in just water after using this product. I spray it on, rub it around hard surface produce (don't rub it on leafy produce), and rinse well.
customer_reviews.author: Blossom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As described. Great product.... have used for years... does a great job removing dirt/ other stuff from produce. Newer version is organic, but could not find anywhere. Love this product. Rinses without residue. Delivered quickly, intact and without problems.
customer_reviews.author: radiofan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent safe veggie wash product
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the price and really safe to use on veggies n fruits. I juice at home so it gets used pretty frequently but I'm still on bottle #1 of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Levels

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for washdown of fresh veggies like green grapes or things you would pop in your mouth and eat off the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my produce good for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: My produce has been lasting a week longer than normal. I buy vegetables in bulk and need them to last 2 weeks between grocery shopping. This spray has seriously extended the life of my fresh produce. Very happy with this product, will definitely be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: R. G.

customer_reviews.title: Smell great; Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite veggie wash! I put all veggies in a metal strainer spray, move around and rub with my hands, run water to rinse and all are cleaned. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great I have had others and it leaves a smell and taste. This does not. I think we should all be using this to kill Germs from The store
customer_reviews.author: Luann

customer_reviews.title: Fruit and vegie wash
customer_reviews.text: I can't begin to say just how much i love this product. It has a wonderful mild soap like feel to it and a great scent. My fruits and vegetables looks clean and smells clean. I can't wait to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This works great for all veggies and fruit... you can really see dirt before washing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really gets gunk off
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how squeeky clean vegies and fruit came after a wash or spray with this Veggie Wash. I feel better about eating produce that is on the "dirty" list...like blueberries and strawberries and peppers.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Broiles

customer_reviews.title: Just too small
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a big bottle, and it’s used very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Show

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I didn't believe in veggie wash. ...we figured it wouldn't really work. But my grandmother got us a bottle.... so we tried it. It's excellent. You can really feel the difference in the fruit and veggies. It's like a layer of grime is lifted. Very happy with this product. Can't live without it now. Try it. ..you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I can tell the difference before and after use this! It’s a great product
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Cleans my fruits and veggies perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it cleans very well and I dont taste any bad after taste
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia T

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job, but what's in it?
customer_reviews.text: This spray does a nice job of removing residue from fresh fruits and veggies. My blueberries change from looking a little dusty to being dark and luscious. I wish they had more information on what's in it though! If you have found this review helpful, please give me a positive vote!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good for wash fruits and vegetables
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for wash vegetables and fruits. I will Unlimited buy it
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Dai

customer_reviews.title: Cleans so many things
customer_reviews.text: I use it to clean my fruits, coffee tumbler, counter tip and may more things. I love this product a lot. IT WORKS WELL.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Make your fruits and vegetables cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This fruit-vegetable cleaner is great, especially when it comes to grapes, cherries, and broccoli。 I like to soak for a while and get a lot of dirt coming out again。
customer_reviews.author: chunzhen

customer_reviews.title: This is MUST have for every kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this and the price is wonderful on Amazon (Prime shipping available as well). I love how natural it is and how it works so well on the grapes I get from Costco. No more white film that tastes bad. I use this on everything. I had food poisoning so I am VERY diligent about washing fruits and vegetables now. This stuff is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Every single one of the spray bottles broke
customer_reviews.text: It's not that this isn't a good product, it is! BUT.. every single spray bottle broke. And they broke when the bottle's are still 90% full. Obvious design flaw. We bought a good commercial grade spray bottle and emptied all the contents into that. Annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Jeran Artery

customer_reviews.title: Favorite veggie wash
customer_reviews.text: Of all of the veggie wash brands we have tried this far, this one it our favorite. The 3-pack is a pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wash is great to help break up the dirt and the waxy ...
customer_reviews.text: The wash is great to help break up the dirt and the waxy layer on fruits and veggies. I am at ease now after using this fruit and veggie wash and happier knowing i didn't consume all that icky stuff. I should have used this sooner, thinking about all that wax and dirt i've consumed in the past mixes me quiver.
customer_reviews.author: Pompom

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily to clean veggies. Not a lot more to say here.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca G

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: very good to use , after use this washed look very clean , and feel safe to eat. i give one for my mam ,she also very like it
customer_reviews.author: Tiancheng You

customer_reviews.title: WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Mixed reviews on this. It definitely cleans but not used to not soaking veggies in other products. Don't like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There's a strange flavor
customer_reviews.text: it is very easy to use, just spray, spray. But there's a strange flavor I don't like, I need to rinse it 2-3 times. I may change a brand to try.
customer_reviews.author: hong C.

customer_reviews.title: The veggie wash definitely works best. It has a sour taste if you don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Did a comparison test with water and the veggie wash on grapes and apples. The veggie wash definitely works best. It has a sour taste if you don't rinse it thoroughly, but it works well in removing pesticides and dirt from food. Will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chrismis15

customer_reviews.title: Love this Stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Swear by this stuff. Works Great on Fruits and Vegetables. Cleans them Nicely and No harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and I also found it great at washing bottles and sippy cups. It takes the milk smell out fast without leaving a soapy smell!
customer_reviews.author: Michael La Ronn

customer_reviews.title: Fruit and vegetables clean
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and can be sprayed with vegetables and fruits.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: ... stuff is worth the money but makes me feel better that i have washed fruits and vegetables the best ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not for sure it this stuff is worth the money but makes me feel better that i have washed fruits and vegetables the best i can
customer_reviews.author: E. ORFF

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made bottles
customer_reviews.text: cheap made bottles, doesn't spray, I have changed it to different bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylynn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Box and product came damaged. I kept the item because I can't get it locally and something is better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lee

customer_reviews.title: I use this stuff every day.
customer_reviews.text: I never eat fruit or veggies that I don't wash first with this stuff. You can really see the difference on waxed produce. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Newberry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The best to wash your fruits and vegetables. After you use it you can never eat your fruits and vegetables again without first washing them with this producto. Healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Keyla

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE TRY
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it actually removes the pesticide or not but it’s worth trying
customer_reviews.author: MikkaRose

customer_reviews.title: Works well & rinses clean
customer_reviews.text: A must for removing all the stuff that's not natural. Will buy again when i ever run out. I can enjoy eating fruits & veggies as they were intended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Western Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Nasty Taste!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a nasty after taste...even after rinsing and scrubbing produce. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Karisa

customer_reviews.title: Veggie Wash
customer_reviews.text: It is so essential to wash off your fruits and veggies to eliminate all of the pesticides. This is a great product to do just that!
customer_reviews.author: Allen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the FIT cleaner and I didn't like the way it smelled. I discovered this one at one of my local supermarkets and loved it from the beginning! It works really well and really removes the wax! Plus it smells good! My store no longer sells it, so thank you so much Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: uzziell

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, not happy with the condition it was in when it was delivered.
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy that the plastic bag was opened and the liquid was all over the bottles and the box was all wet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spray bottles all broke!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but this really bothered me! The product may work as advertised but all 3 spray bottles broke after 2 or 3 sprays. One didn’t even make it passed 1 spray. I poor product out on veggies now and waste most of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Mariani

customer_reviews.title: Natural Fruit and vegetable cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Veggie wash is easy to use. I used it for fruits and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Rolsen

customer_reviews.title: Must have item
customer_reviews.text: If you try this to wash grapes, you'll learn why you need this product right away. Very satisfied and can't live without it from now on.
customer_reviews.author: DonghunChung

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ive always used FIT wash before buying this brand. The veggie wash seems to work better and doesnt leave the residual taste afterwards. It works great and its cheaper than the name brand washes. Winning in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Gennifer11

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do a good job, but has kind of a weird cirtus smell that feels "chemical".
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend everyone to clean their fruits and vegetable first and I believe this is a great product to do it with. Very easy to use, washes right off and I do not ever taste it. We use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works superb. Fruit and veggie wash
customer_reviews.text: Love this fruit and veggie wash! Great value and works great
customer_reviews.author: Letitia DeBenedetta

customer_reviews.title: Very good especially during the current situation
customer_reviews.text: Nicely clean the surface of veggie and fruits. use it everyday. I guess it should save the family from the dirt and any other bad things.
customer_reviews.author: Chao

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. It removes that heavy sticky waxy residue that cannot be removed by any other means and I feel much safer eating my fruits and vegetables after removing the films with this spray.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Vitoria

customer_reviews.title: Leaky sprayer
customer_reviews.text: All three bottles' sprayers stopped working properly before the product was used.
customer_reviews.author: Sarita

customer_reviews.title: A great product to clean my fruits and veggies
customer_reviews.text: A great product to clean my fruits and veggies! I've had other products that leave a funny smell, this does not! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Luann

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price, nice smell
customer_reviews.text: Use this product every day to clean fruit and vegetables to prevent getting sick. I have used it for at least 3 years or more. It works! And I like that it has a citrus smell.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J

customer_reviews.title: Great item to have in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love how well this cleans and suds up your produce nicely. Feel like it actually does something beneficial when I use this product
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Great for fruit too!!
customer_reviews.text: If i have a lot of produce i put some water in the sink along with some cleaner and wash.

product_meta.title: Veggie Wash All Natural Fruit and Vegetable Wash Sprayer, Pack of 3, 16-Ounce Each
product_meta.description: Size:16 Fl Oz (Pack of 3)| Style:NaturalVeggie Wash All Natural Fruit and Vegetable Wash is a great choice for you and your family. Combat agricultural chemicals that aren’t washed off by rain and irrigation. Remove coated wax on your fruits and vegetables, before they get to your kitchen table. Safely remove soil, agricultural chemicals, and handling residue found on both standard and organic fruits and vegetables. Cut through wax and chemicals and rest assure that your fruits and vegetables are safely clean. Veggie Wash has been a favorite for more than 15 years because it is effective and safe. Stop Rinsing and Start Cleaning with Veggie Wash.
feature_bullets: Safely remove wax, soil, agricultural chemicals, and handling residue found on both standard and organic fruits and vegetables
Ideal for standard and organic fruits and vegetables
Cut through wax and chemicals and be sure your fruits and vegetables are safely clean
